Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;methyl iodide^reset; to the ^green;purple-armored scientist^reset; at the top floor of the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;.
I need a particularly dangerous chemical known as ^orange;methyl iodide^reset;. That will do the trick for this mixture. I'd grab it myself but this might explode! Can you help me out?
Methyl iodide is your key ingredient in ^green;pesticides and fertilizers.^reset; you'll want it if you are going to be growing plants.
